trans-unit.source: Install Maintenance mode updates
trans-unit.target: Install Maintenance mode updates

trans-unit.source: Explains how to use Windows PowerShell for StorSimple to install maintenance mode updates.
trans-unit.target: Explains how to use Windows PowerShell for StorSimple to install maintenance mode updates.

trans-unit.source: To install Maintenance mode updates via Windows PowerShell for StorSimple
trans-unit.target: To install Maintenance mode updates via Windows PowerShell for StorSimple

trans-unit.source: If you haven't done so already, access the device serial console and select option 1, **Log in with full access**.
trans-unit.target: If you haven't done so already, access the device serial console and select option 1, **Log in with full access**.

trans-unit.source: Type the password.
trans-unit.target: Type the password.

trans-unit.source: The default password is **Password1**.
trans-unit.target: The default password is **Password1**.

trans-unit.source: At the command prompt, type:
trans-unit.target: At the command prompt, type:

trans-unit.source: You will be notified if updates are available and whether the updates are disruptive or non-disruptive.
trans-unit.target: You will be notified if updates are available and whether the updates are disruptive or non-disruptive.

trans-unit.source: To apply disruptive updates, you need to put the device into Maintenance mode.
trans-unit.target: To apply disruptive updates, you need to put the device into Maintenance mode.

trans-unit.source: See [Step 2: Enter Maintenance mode](storsimple-update-device.md#step2) for instructions.
trans-unit.target: See [Step 2: Enter Maintenance mode](storsimple-update-device.md#step2) for instructions.

trans-unit.source: When your device is in Maintenance mode, at the command prompt, type: `Start-HcsUpdate`
trans-unit.target: When your device is in Maintenance mode, at the command prompt, type: `Start-HcsUpdate`

trans-unit.source: You will be prompted for confirmation.
trans-unit.target: You will be prompted for confirmation.

trans-unit.source: After you confirm the updates, they will be installed on the controller that you are currently accessing.
trans-unit.target: After you confirm the updates, they will be installed on the controller that you are currently accessing.

trans-unit.source: After the updates are installed, the controller will restart.
trans-unit.target: After the updates are installed, the controller will restart.

trans-unit.source: Monitor the status of updates.
trans-unit.target: Monitor the status of updates.

trans-unit.source: Type:
trans-unit.target: Type:

trans-unit.source: If the `RunInProgress` is `True`, the update is still in progress.
trans-unit.target: If the `RunInProgress` is `True`, the update is still in progress.

trans-unit.source: If `RunInProgress` is `False`, it indicates that the update has completed.
trans-unit.target: If `RunInProgress` is `False`, it indicates that the update has completed.

trans-unit.source: When the update is installed on the current controller and it has restarted, connect to the other controller and perform steps 1 through 6.
trans-unit.target: When the update is installed on the current controller and it has restarted, connect to the other controller and perform steps 1 through 6.

trans-unit.source: After both controllers are updated, exit Maintenance mode.
trans-unit.target: After both controllers are updated, exit Maintenance mode.

trans-unit.source: See [Step 4: Exit Maintenance mode](storsimple-update-device.md#step4) for instructions.
trans-unit.target: See [Step 4: Exit Maintenance mode](storsimple-update-device.md#step4) for instructions.
